rooms.description: Large entrance hall with a welcoming foyer and coat closet, following Vastu principles for entry alignment.
Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring minimalist decor and ample natural light in accordance with local aesthetics and Vastu guidelines for activity spaces.
Minimalist open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, designed for functionality, featuring clean lines and energy-efficient appliances. Location optimized for Vastu (east-facing) for prosperity.
Adjacent to the living area with a minimalist design, perfect for family meals and gatherings. Placement ensures balanced energy flow as per Vastu.
Spacious master bedroom designed with a serene ambience, located in the north-east for calmness and positive energy. Includes built-in storage and en-suite bathroom.
Secondary bedroom designed for privacy with adequate lighting and ventilation, following minimalist principles and local design norms.
Additional bedroom ensuring ample personal space for the family, arranged in a balanced layout with respect to Vastu orientation.
Comfortable guest room with minimalist design and functional storage, ensuring privacy and convenience for visitors.
Master bathroom attached to the master bedroom, featuring modern fixtures and good ventilation in compliance with building norms and Vastu principles.
Guest bathroom located conveniently for visitors, adhering to local building standards and efficient space utilization.
